sentences.en: ...a country where half the workforce is unemployed.
sentences.cn: …一个半数劳动力无业的国家。

sentences.en: A large part of the workforce is employed in agriculture.
sentences.cn: 劳动人口中一大部分受雇于农业.

sentences.en: a progressive reduction in the size of the workforce
A quarter of the local workforce is unemployed.
sentences.cn: 本地劳动力中有四分之一失业.

sentences.en: It is too early to say what effect, if any, there will be on the workforce.
sentences.cn: 如果会对劳动力产生一些影响，现在就说是什么影响还言之过早。

sentences.en: Our workforce is highly trained and competitive.
sentences.cn: 我们的员工队伍训练有素，竞争意识强。

sentences.en: The company has strenuously defended its decision to reduce the workforce.
sentences.cn: 公司竭力为其裁员的决定辩护.

sentences.en: The company is cutting its workforce.

sentences.cn: 这个决定激怒了劳工大众。
这家工厂的职工多达千人。

sentences.en: The factory's workforce has dwindled from over 4,000 to a few hundred.
sentences.cn: 工厂雇员总数已经从4,000多人减少到几百人。

sentences.en: The job losses will reduce the total workforce to 7,000.
sentences.cn: 职位减少后，在职工人总数将减至7,000人。

sentences.en: The new model is a testament to the skill and dedication of the workforce.
sentences.cn: 这种新型产品显示了全体员工的技术水平和敬业精神。

sentences.en: the rank and file of the workforce

sentences.cn: 劳动力中男性占绝大多数.

sentences.en: They reckoned he was a hatchet man, out to shred the workforce and crush the union.
sentences.cn: 他们估计他是上司派来的刽子手，专门对工人大开杀戒，大肆镇压工会。

sentences.en: To clear the land and harvest the bananas they decided they needed a male workforce.
sentences.cn: 为了清理那片地和收割香蕉，他们决定雇请男劳力。

sentences.en: Women now represent almost 50% of the workforce.
sentences.cn: 如今女性几乎占全部劳动人口的 50%。

trans.tran_en: all the people who work in a particular industry or company, or are available to work in a particular country or area
